title: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work. Description: Color orange doesn't work. Steps to reproduce: 1. Insert a report item. 2. Set the color or background color to orange. 3.
OB: When setting the color or background color of a report item to orange, the color does not appear as expected.
EB: The color or background color of the report item should appear as orange.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Insert a report item. 2. Set the color or background color to orange. Verify that the color or background color of the report item does not appear as orange.
